t.t:
Hi! I am a bot to account expenses, income, plan budgets, etc. To see examples of my reports simply send command /report_example. To add new record about an expense, send a text message for example "Dinner 200". You are able to remove any test data by sending command /reset. To get full list of available commands send /help.
I'm at your command!
